definition: sorbitol C6H14O6 (sugar substitute and mild laxative)
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
alcohol/wine with high alcohol content/rich/pure/good wine/sterols

sentences.english: Using sorbitol as a substitute for polyglycerin to make an industrial deformer was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 试验了用山梨醇取代聚甘油制工业用消泡剂的可能性。

sentences.english: Sorbitol acetals is the most one kind of the nucleating agents for polypropylene crystallization.
sentences.chinese: 山梨醇缩醛是最重要的聚丙烯成核剂之一。

sentences.english: Transporters is a key enzyme for the transportation of sorbitol in Rosaceae plants.
sentences.chinese: 山梨醇转运子是蔷薇科植物运输山梨醇的重要酶。

sentences.english: Transporters is a key enzyme for the transportation of sorbitol in Rosaceae plants.
sentences.chinese: 山梨醇转运子是蔷薇科植物运输山梨醇的重要酶。

sentences.english: Sorbitol has one very odd property.
sentences.chinese: 山梨醇有一非常奇怪的性质。

sentences.english: The invention discloses a method for preparing isosorbide modified polyester.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种异山梨醇改性聚酯的制备方法。

sentences.english: Sorbitol took an effect on controlling weight loss of strawberry at normal temperature.
sentences.chinese: 山梨醇能起到良好的控制草莓在常温下的失重问题。

sentences.english: This paper introduces three enzymes related to sorbitol metabolism.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了参与山梨醇代谢的三种酶。
